General.Name: Cofoe Medical Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Cofoe Medical Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells professional household medical devices in China. The company offers blood pressure monitors, fingertip pulse oximeters, nebulizers, oxygen concentrators, thermometers, glucose meters, HCG test kits, and H.Pylori; band aid; air mattresses, canes, commode chairs, hospital beds, wheelchairs, and rollators; hearing aids; and ostomy bags and adult diapers. The company also exports its products to approximately 46 countries and districts, including the United States, Mexico, Chile, Germany, Spain, Italy, Turkey, the Middle East, and other countries. Cofoe Medical Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
